articles.title: Jaylen Brown scores 41, Sam Hauser hits 10 threes in Celtics win over Hawks
articles.description:
Hauser became the first player in NBA history to attempt 20 or more threes without taking a shot inside the arc.

The post Jaylen Brown scores 41, Sam Hauser hits 10 threes in Celtics win over Hawks appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: Jaylen Brown scores 41, Sam Hauser hits 10 threes
